artist: Maker: Newcomb College Pottery; Potter: Joseph Fortune Meyer; Decorator: Sarah Agnes Estelle Irvine
description: Arts and Crafts style; wide foot with body flaring very slightly outward to steep shoulder; wide mouth opening on very short, wide neck; relief design of vertical stems with long, narrow leaf fronds; vertical purple glaze streaks with peach color beneath near top; tan interior
markings: on underside, incised and in blue: CN [intertwined] |on underside, incised: CP | M [?] | GC [?]
title: Vase
